name: Noelle
description: A maid in the service of the Knights of Favonius that dreams of joining their ranks someday.

skillTalents.name: Favonius Bladework - Maid
skillTalents.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.
Charged Attack
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous swirling attacks against all nearby enemies.

At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skillTalents.name: Breastplate
skillTalents.description:
Summons a protective stone armor, dealing Geo DMG to surrounding enemies and creating a shield. The shield's DMG Absorption scaled based on Noelle's DEF.

The shield has the following properties:

When Noelle's Normal and Charged Attacks hit a target, they have a certain chance to regenerate HP for all characters, both on and off the field.
Applies the Geo element to the character.
Possesses 250% Absorption Efficiency against Geo DMG.

The amount of HP healed when regeneration is triggered scales based on Noelle's DEF.

skillTalents.name: Sweeping Time
skillTalents.description:
Gathering the strength of stone around her weapon, Noelle strikes the enemies surrounding her within a large AoE, dealing Geo DMG.

Afterwards, Noelle gains the following effects:

Larger attack AoE.
Converts attack DMG to Geo DMG.
Increased ATK that scales based on her DEF.

passiveTalents.name: Devotion
passiveTalents.description:
When Noelle is in the party but not on the field, this ability triggers automatically when the active character's HP falls below 30%:
Creates a shield that lasts for 20s and absorbs DMG equal to 400% of Noelle's DEF. This effect can only occur once every 60s.

passiveTalents.name: Nice and Clean
passiveTalents.description:
Every 4 Normal or Charged Attack hits will decrease the CD of Breastplate by 1s.
Hitting multiple enemies with a single attack is only counted as 1 hit.

passiveTalents.name: Maid's Knighthood
passiveTalents.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Noelle has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: I Got Your Back
constellations.description: While Sweeping Time and Breastplate are both in effect, the chance of Breastplate's healing effects activating is increased to 100%.

constellations.name: Combat Maid
constellations.description: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

constellations.name: Invulnerable Maid
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Breastplate by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: To Be Cleaned
constellations.description: When Breastplate's duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of Geo DMG to surrounding enemies.

constellations.name: Favonius Sweeper Master
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Sweeping Time by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Must Be Spotless
constellations.description:
Sweeping Time increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.
Additionally, every enemy defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.
